## R Markdown

```{r}
## Bases R
df$VAR1 <- ifelse(df$dig_ct_f =="YK","Y",df$dig_ct_f)
df$VAR1 <- ifelse(df$dig_ct_f =="NK","N",df$dig_ct_f)
```

### Tidyvese; How the cool kids do it.

```{r}
df <- df %>% mutate( VAR1 = if_else(dig_ct_f == "YK","Y",dig_ct_f),
                     VAR1 = if_else(dig_ct_f == "NK","N",dig_ct_f))

# Janita @ Slack

df <-df %>% mutate(Var2 = case_when(
VAR1 =="NK" ~ "N",
VAR1 == "YK" ~ "Y",
TRUE ~ VAR1))
```
